summary:
Every named NPC with their own unique voice.
THIS IS NOT A MOD YET!
This is a call arms to the modding community and beyond.
descriptionHtml:
HERE\'s THE IDEA! - Give 1000+ people, all around the world, a chance to audition for the opportunity to choose a character in Skyrim and replace the voice for them.  At this time several actors are doing well over 10 voices each and although they are great, I believe it would add a tremendous amount of immersion if no one had the same actors voice.

Someone, somewhere has got to want to sponsor this! Contact me! All we need is the recording time and a few good modders to bring it all together. 

Maybe an Official Nexus Community Update?

Could you imagine...?
author: The Hero Theory
